dispute.title: EU Dispute Resolution
dispute.description:
The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (ODR): https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr/.
Our email address can be found above in the imprint.

consumerDispute.title: Consumer Dispute Resolution/Universal Arbitration Board
consumerDispute.description: We are not willing or obliged to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.
